heading: Tuesday Night
text: Variable clouds. Scattered snow showers, mainly early and again late; a trace to 2 inches, mainly over high terrain. Lows from the mid 20s to around 30, with some lower 20s northeast and in the Adirondacks. West winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 30 mph early.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, except slight chance of sprinkles or flurries in southeastern valleys; another trace to 2 inches mainly over high terrain. Highs in the low to mid 30s, except upper 30s to lower 40s in southeastern valleys, and in the Hudson Valley. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, numerous north and in the southern Greens. Lows in the upper 20s to lower 30s. Southwest winds 5 mph or less, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
